title: List of New York Knicks head coaches - Wikipedia
snippet: Tom Thibodeau was the Knicks head coach from 2020 to 2025.

title: New York Knicks hire Mike Brown as new head coach | CNN
snippet: Mike Brown has been named the new head coach of the Knicks.

title: Tom Thibodeau - Wikipedia
snippet: He was head coach of the Minnesota Timberwolves from 2016 to 2019, before becoming the Knicks' head coach. He won the Coach of the Year award again in 2021 after leading the Knicks to their first playoff berth in eight seasons. In 2025, he led the Knicks to their first conference finals appearance ...

title: New coach, new expectations: Knicks aim for NBA Finals under Mike Brown | NBA.com
snippet: How the Knicks and OG Anunoby could be different under the new leadership of Mike Brown. Josh Hart opens his Kia Sixth Man campaign, Karl-Anthony Towns flashes high-post potential and Sam Hauser works free.
